title: Mexican Shots

ingredients.content: 1 - 2 tsp Tabasco sauce, or to taste (see tip)
1 - 2 tsp ground black pepper, or to taste

preparations.content: Place all ingredients in mixing bowl then blend <b>30 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to 2 sterilised glass bottles (0.7 l each) and serve in shot glasses.

hintsAndTricks: Mexicans are usually served in shot glasses. They should be very spicy and peppery. If preferred, reduce quantities of Tabasco sauce and ground black pepper to taste.
This Mexican-inspired drink is a German cocktail similar to a spicy Bloody Mary.
